seo.title: About ShapeShyft
seo.description: Learn about ShapeShyft - the platform that transforms LLM outputs into structured, reliable APIs.

hero.title: About ShapeShyft
hero.subtitle: We're on a mission to make AI APIs reliable and predictable for developers everywhere.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: ShapeShyft was born from a simple frustration: working with LLM outputs is unpredictable. Every developer who has integrated AI into their applications knows the challenge of parsing unstructured text responses and handling edge cases.
story.paragraph2: We built ShapeShyft to solve this problem once and for all. By combining JSON Schema validation with intelligent prompt engineering, we transform chaotic LLM outputs into structured, type-safe APIs that developers can rely on.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower developers with tools that make AI integration as reliable as traditional APIs. We believe structured outputs shouldn't require complex parsing logic or endless error handling.

reliability.title: Reliability First:
reliability.description: Your APIs should work consistently, every time.

transparency.title: Transparent Pricing:
transparency.description: Pay for what you use, no hidden fees.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Join developers who are building reliable AI-powered applications with ShapeShyft.
